SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302simplestock
Package com.example.cab302simplestock.model.ManagerInterfaces

Interface IGroupManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
GroupManager
public interface IGroupManager
Interface for group manager, used to manage groups in a database. Defines CRUD methods for Groups, and also extra methods for objects associated with groups, such as categories and users.

  • Method Details

    • addGroup

      int addGroup(Group group)
      CRUD method for adding a group to a database.
      Parameters:
      group - The group to add.
      Returns:
      The ID in the database for the newly added group.

    • updateGroup

      void updateGroup(Group group)
      CRUD method for updating a group in the database. Should use a DAO update method in the implementation.
      Parameters:
      group - The group to update and its new values.

    • deleteGroup

      void deleteGroup(Group group)
      CRUD method for deleting a group in the database. Should use a DAO delete method.
      Parameters:
      group - The group to delete, which value is used to delete the group is implementation specific.

    • getAllGroups

      List<Group> getAllGroups()
      CRUD method to get all groups that exist in the database. Should use a DAO read method.
      Returns:
      A list of all groups in the database.

    • getUsers

      List<User> getUsers(int groupID)
      Searches and finds all users with access to view a specific group.
      Parameters:
      groupID - The ID of the group to search in.
      Returns:
      A list of all users with access to the group.

    • findUser

      User findUser(String userEmail, int groupID)
      Finds a single user with access to view a group, the search should be based on the email value of that user.
      Parameters:
      userEmail - The email of the user to search for. Handling of an empty value is implementation specific.
      groupID - The ID of the group to search in. Invalid ID values need to be handled correctly.
      Returns:
      The user if found with that email and with access to that group.

    • addUser

      int addUser(User user, int groupID)
      Adds a new user with view access to a group
      Parameters:
      user - The user to add to the group.
      groupID - The ID of the group to add the user to.
      Returns:
      The ID of the user that was added to the group.

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser(int userID, int groupID)
      Deletes view access for a user in a group.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user to delete group access for.
      groupID - The ID of the group the user should be deleted from.

    • getCategories

      List<Category> getCategories(int groupID)
      Gets all categories that exist in a group.
      Parameters:
      groupID - The ID of the group to search in.
      Returns:
      A list of all categories in the group.

    • findCategory

      Category findCategory(String categoryName, int groupID)
      Finds a specific category in a group based on the name of the category.
      Parameters:
      categoryName - The name of the category.
      groupID - The ID of the group to search in.
      Returns:
      The found category with an identical name as the parameter one and in the group.

    • addCategory

      int addCategory(Category category)

    • deleteCategory

      void deleteCategory(int categoryID)
